scripts:
set ACL on /conf
 allow jcr:all for ets-content-admin
 end

set ACL on /content
 allow jcr:all for ets-content-admin
 end

set ACL on /content/dam
 allow jcr:all for ets-content-admin
 end

set ACL on /content
 allow jcr:write,jcr:modifyProperties,jcr:addChildNodes,jcr:removeChildNodes,jcr:lockManagement,jcr:versionManagement for ets-content-author
 end

set ACL on /content
 deny crx:replicate for ets-content-author
 end

set ACL on /content/dam
 allow jcr:read for ets-content-author
 end

set ACL on /content/dam
 deny crx:replicate for ets-content-author
 end

set ACL on /conf/ets
 allow jcr:read for ets-content-author
 end

set ACL on /conf/ets
 deny crx:replicate for ets-content-author
 end

set ACL on /content
 allow jcr:read,crx:replicate for ets-content-publish
 end

set ACL on /conf/ets
 allow jcr:read,crx:replicate for ets-content-publish
 end

set ACL on /content/dam
 allow jcr:read,crx:replicate for ets-content-publish
 end

set ACL on /content
 allow jcr:read for ets-content-readonly
 end

set ACL on /content
 deny crx:replicate for ets-content-readonly
 end

set ACL on /content/dam
 allow jcr:read for ets-content-readonly
 end

set ACL on /content/dam
 deny crx:replicate for ets-content-readonly
 end

set ACL on /conf/ets
 allow jcr:read for ets-content-readonly
 end

set ACL on /conf/ets
 deny crx:replicate for ets-content-readonly
 end

set ACL on /content/dam
 allow jcr:all for ets-dam-admin
 end

set ACL on /content/ets-org
 deny jcr:write,crx:replicate for ets-dam-admin
 end

set ACL on /content/dam
 allow jcr:write for ets-dam-author
 end

set ACL on /content/ets-org
 deny jcr:write,crx:replicate for ets-dam-author
 end
